long_description: Use Nikwax Polar Proof(R) concentrate to add water repellency to your fleece outerwear while maintaining great breathability. First, clean your fleece clothing using Nikwax Tech Wash(R) (sold separately), then use Polar Proof to renew the Durable Water Repellent coating. Quick and easy to apply in a washing machine; 100ml packet treats two garments.
short_description: Use Nikwax Polar Proof(R) concentrate to add water repellency to your fleece outerwear while maintaining great breathability.
